channel.title: Left 4 Dead 2 SILVER GUNS
channel.description:
ok... So I bought L4D2 for $5 during the give and get event.
after I downloaded it for like 15 hours... I played it. Everything was fine BUT the guns are all silver and shiny. Help? :| Here's a screen shot: ![l4dwhiteshinyguns.jpg|690x500](upload://z0vMIXrfKa8GUTLDLBDTTtV5rl8.jpeg)

item.title: Left 4 Dead 2 SILVER GUNS
item.dc:creator: Mabilis
item.description:
rx33gundam:

I’m trying to IMPRESS MY DAD!
My theory is that if he likes it… he’d buy more games FOR US. :retard:
The guns are more awesome if they are textured and not “silvery shiny”. It would impress him better.

and… thank you russilker. I’ll note that. I’ll hoard money as much as I can so I can buy what you said I should buy.

Read full topic

item.description:
If my game fucked up and did that I wouldn’t complain.

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead 2 SILVER GUNS
item.dc:creator: Mabilis
item.description:
Go to the ‘crucial’ website and test what ram is compatible using their scanner.

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead 2 SILVER GUNS
item.dc:creator: rx33gundam
item.description:
russilker:

With his computer, though, its possible that his motherboard doesn’t support more than 4gb, although more likely than not the limit is 8.

Either way, look inside your computer. Let us know how many RAM slots you have, and write down as much as u can about the ram chip(s) already in the motherboard so you can buy a compatible model.

There are just 2 slots for DDR2 ram and an extra slot below the video card. There’s not much description on the Ram. I only have 1 Ram and it’s been tampered with by the people who reformatted my computer last January.

Than you for your time but I’ll just make their tech support diagnose my computer so they can recommend me what I should buy. I know they’ll recommend the same things you said but it won’t hurt to do this right?

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead 2 SILVER GUNS
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
With his computer, though, its possible that his motherboard doesn’t support more than 4gb, although more likely than not the limit is 8.

Either way, look inside your computer. Let us know how many RAM slots you have, and write down as much as u can about the ram chip(s) already in the motherboard so you can buy a compatible model.

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead 2 SILVER GUNS
item.dc:creator: Mango_Assassin
item.description:
russilker:

4gb is considered a safe minimum nowadays, and if I may suggest a card it would have to be the 5770, which isn’t too expensive compared to other cards and would provide a VERY generous boost to your performance.

4GB being minimum standard, I’d say 6GB to be on the safe side.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: papernick
item.description:
rx33gundam:

So… If I bought a the GPU russilker is talking about and 3 more gb of RAM… can my computer, with 2 cores, handle crysis? I want to play the mechassualt mod:retard:

Sorry for the grammar. It ain’t my foreign language.

I think that it IS your foreign language

item.title: Left 4 Dead 2 SILVER GUNS
item.dc:creator: Jotie
item.description:
garthbartin:

BTW, I think that glitche has to do with HDR. As long as HDR isn’t on I don’t think you should have trouble. And buy a new card.

Isn’t the HDR option turned on or off by changing the shaders to high or medium?

Mango Assassin:

newe gpu = newer shader options right?

It just means better graphics overall.

rx33gundam:

No one said “get a new card” before you.

But anyway… I’ll buy a new Video card and a 1 more gig of ram.

Thanks to everyone who helped me.:retard:

So, you made a choice of wich gpu you’re gonna get?

OH, and I don’t think 1 gb more of RAM will be enough, these days you’ll need at least 3-4 gb.

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead 2 SILVER GUNS
item.dc:creator: rx33gundam
item.description:
Flatline:

I wonder how many times people will have to say ‘get a new card’ before he realises he needs to get a new card.

No one said “get a new card” before you.

But anyway… I’ll buy a new Video card and a 1 more gig of ram.

Thanks to everyone who helped me.:retard:

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead 2 SILVER GUNS
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
No, don’t upgrade your processor yet. The graphics card would give you a much larger boost in FPS, and your dual core shouldn’t be TOO much of a bottleneck (you could try overclocking it since its frequency is a little low).

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead 2 SILVER GUNS

item.title: Left 4 Dead 2 SILVER GUNS
item.dc:creator: rx33gundam
item.description:
Jotie:

There really isn’t any other fix than changing the shader settings to medium.
A friend of mine had the exact same problem.

The only solution would be to upgrade your GPU, it’s not even that expensive anymore!

TIP: Something around an Amd Hd 5670/HD 5770

What’s should I do?

Upgrade to 4 cores?
or
Buy a new video card?

which would I have more benefits besides L4D2.

Read full topic
